summary: In 1942 submarine commander Jeff Conway secretly photographs Japanese aircraft carriers in the Coral Sea but his submarine is damaged and he's forced to surrender.
cast: Cliff Robertson|Gia Scala|Teru Shimada|Patricia Cutts|Gene Blakely|Rian Garrick|L.Q. Jones|Robin Hughes|Gordon Jones|Tom Laughlin|Phil Adams|Tom Anthony|Barry Cahill|James T. Callahan|Pat Colby|James Forrest|James T. Goto|Dale Ishimoto|Robert Kino|Paul Mantee|Carlyle Mitchell|Rollin Moriyama|Bob Okazaki|Robin Riley|Dan Riss|K.L. Smith|Roy Taguchi|George Takei|Larry Thor|Russell Thorson|Patrick Westwood|James Yagi|Eiji Yamashiro|John Zaremba
title: Battle of the Coral Sea
